iPhone App. Android App. Claude Code. Open Router. DeepSeek. Anthropic. OpenAI. LM Studio. Ollama. Context Editing. Context Visualation. Cost Analysis. VS Code. CoPilot. Automatic Memory. Rule Detection. Language Detection. GitLab. GitHub. Automatic Snapshots. Commit Staging.

Intelligent Context Management

Advanced Code Understanding

Our AI analyzes your entire codebase to provide contextually aware suggestions that understand your project's architecture.

Semantic Analysis Engine

Understands code meaning beyond syntax, recognizing patterns, idioms, and architectural decisions throughout your project.

Cross-File Intelligence

Tracks relationships between files, modules, and dependencies to suggest changes that maintain consistency across your codebase.

Real-time Context Updates

Continuously learns from your coding patterns and project evolution to provide increasingly accurate suggestions.

Context Window: 200K tokens Accuracy: 99.2%

Optimized Cost Structure

Enterprise-Grade Efficiency

Revolutionary token optimization reduces costs by up to 90% while maintaining superior code generation quality.

Smart Token Management

Advanced compression algorithms and intelligent context pruning minimize token usage without sacrificing output quality.

Predictive Caching System

ML-powered cache predicts and stores frequently accessed code patterns, reducing redundant API calls by 85%.

Usage-Based Pricing

Transparent pricing model charges only for actual usage with detailed analytics and cost breakdowns per project.

Avg. savings: $2,400/month ROI: 320%

Our innovative card stacking system provides an intuitive and engaging way to present information
